extracurricular.name: SpaceApps Nasa Hackathon
extracurricular.title: Nasa Hackathon Mentor
description: Mentored over 250 participants in the NASA Space Apps Hackathon, providing technical guidance in programming languages such as Python, Ruby, and Kotlin.
Assisted in the development of 3D animations using Unity for Web and Mobile platforms.
Contributed to the success of diverse projects with insights into innovative technologies and workflows.

extracurricular.name: Hackathon Camsat Uni Lasalle
extracurricular.title: Hackathon Winner
description: Led the winning team in the 2022 Microsatellite Hackathon, designing a CAMSAT with Arduino to capture data during its descent.
Built a Python-based Flask web application to display collected data in real time.
Showcased strong leadership and technical skills, achieving first place in a competitive environment.
